title: Limpiar Unveils On-Demand App Offering Same-Day, Last-Minute, Eco-Friendly Cleaning to Dallas Homes | News | decaturdailydemocrat.com
text: Between hectic work schedules, children's activities, and a never-ending list of errands, maintaining a clean home often takes a backseat for many Dallas residents. Recognizing this challenge, Limpiar , a game-changing on-demand cleaning app and manufacturer of eco-friendly cleaning products, is set to transform how Dallasites approach house cleaning. Limpiar's mobile app connects users with vetted, professional cleaners who employ Limpiar's line of gentle, sustainable products to deliver same day last-minute and same-day cleaning services for homes, offices, and short-term rentals. Limpiar distinguishes itself through its commitment to quality and sustainability. Key features that set Limpiar apart include meticulous vetting and training of cleaners, on-demand booking options, the use of eco-friendly and pet-friendly products, transparent pricing, and a community-focused approach. Demi Oloyede, co-founder and CEO of Limpiar, emphasizes the company's commitment to delivering a premium and fast cleaning service . Oleyede Oloyede said: "Limpiar is not just a cleaning service; it's a commitment to providing quick, efficient, and eco-friendly cleaning solutions. I'm excited about this pivotal step in using Limpiar to redefine the cleaning experience." Limpiar's dedication to sustainability is reflected in its use of green-certified cleaning products. Oloyede said the company believes in treating every home and furry family member with care. Limpiar exclusively uses products that are safe for people, pets, and the environment. Transparent pricing and community commitment Limpiar prides itself on transparent pricing, ensuring that families see the cost of their cleaning service upfront, eliminating hidden fees. The secure payment system through the app adds an extra layer of convenience for users. Jake Adebayo, Chief Technology Officer at Limpiar, said as co-founder at SkillPatron, he witnessed the transformative power of technology in connecting skilled professionals with business opportunities. He added: "Now, atLimpiar, we're leveraging that experience to reimagine the cleaning industry." In addition to providing top-notch green cleaning services, Limpiar is committed to giving back to the community. The company has sealed partnerships with local animal shelters and environmental organizations, donating cleaning supplies and volunteering time to enhance the cleanliness of the community. 5-star ratings from Dallasites So far, Limpiar has earned top ratings from Dallasites, making it a game-changing app and a must-have in the community for 2024. Lisset Velando, Vice President of Silvus, Inc., said she had already used Limpiar twice now for her Uptown Dallas apartment. "Both times, my Limpiadors have done a fantastic job. They arrived on time, cleaned thoroughly, handled linen changes, and were always respectful and polite. I'll be using Limpiar again for future cleanings. Plus, communicating and booking with them is a breeze," shared Lisset. Blair Hendrix, the owner of Smatch North Texas, described Limpiar as a "savior" after a busy week. "Today's Tidy experience was rough, but who cares? I'm raving about Kandi from Limpiar! She and her crew saved the day with a last-minute appointment, going above and beyond. They even removed toilet lids and sink handles! If you need cleaning help, Limpiar is the way to go," shared Blair. Limpiar, currently in beta testing, invites passionate and reliable cleaners to join its team in the DFW metro. Those interested in delivering sparkling clean homes can apply through the Limpiar onboarding portal: https://limpiar.online/become-a-limpiador. Residents eager to experience Limpiar's convenience and quality can download the app from the App Store or Google Play and sign up for the beta waitlist: https://limpiar.online/waitlist/. Demi Oloyede expresses enthusiasm for the beta phase, stating, "During our beta phase, Limpiar users can seamlessly connect to local cleaning opportunities for free, making earning through cleaning more accessible than ever. We're not just launching a platform; we're creating a community that empowers every cleaner." About Limpiar Limpiar is a cutting-edge, on-demand cleaning service that provides quick and efficient cleaning solutions. With a focus on eco-friendliness, pet-friendliness, and convenience, Limpiar is poised to become the go-to choice for individuals seeking on-demand cleaning services. The Limpiar app is available for download on the App Store and Google Play. For more information, visit https://limpiar.online/.
